thread.title: Tom Farber
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Tom Farber

author: Tom Farber
title: Tom Farber
text:
Honestly,
I was scared to death after the stack of (forgiven) IRS letters I received for 42000.00. Without warning I got nailed$$ When My income went up.
I actually thought I was going to pass out after talking to the IRS Agent.
I researched Optima Tax Services on the internet and the BBB. After doing so, I contacted them. The Entire process was explained and the constantly reconfirmed through the whole process.
The continuity was flawless from start until Finish. I will be your best advertising:)
